thread.title: Madden simulated the Super Bowl, here are the results (11 Photos)
thread.title_full: Madden simulated the Super Bowl, here are the results (11 Photos)

author: Jeff
title: Madden simulated the Super Bowl, here are the results (11 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Every year the Madden team runs a simulation ahead of the big game to try and predict the winner. They were on one heck of a hot streak, correctly predicting the winner of 8 out of their first 11 Super Bowls. Even going so far as to predict almost every aspect of the big game 2 years ago, including the final score . This year’s sim is in, and it promises one heck of a game. 
Starting with an opening drive Touchdown by Falcons Running Back Tevin Coleman. 
Patriots 0 – Falcons 7 2 
Tom Brady and the Patriots fire back with a 30 yard pass to Chris Hogan for the TD. 
Patriots 7 – Falcons 7 3 GIF 
Entering the 2nd quarter, Falcons Tailback Devonta Freeman broke loose on a toss to scamper in for the Falcons 2nd score of the game. 
Patriots 7 – Falcons 14 4 GIF 
That would be the score going into halftime, but coming out of the locker room (having enjoyed the Pepsi halftime show) Dion Lewis would take a pass in the flat from Brady and tie the game at 14. 
Patriots 14 – Falcons 14 5 GIF 
Both teams would then exchange field goals, before the Patriots took the lead on a 48 yard kick from Stephen Gostkowski to put the Patriots 3 points ahead. Advertisement
